## CustomizableCheckboxValue interface

CustomizableCheckboxValue defines the price and sku of a product whose page contains a customized set of checkbox values.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface CustomizableCheckboxValue 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [option\_type\_id?](./magento-api.customizablecheckboxvalue.option_type_id.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['Int'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The ID assigned to the value. |
|  [price\_type?](./magento-api.customizablecheckboxvalue.price_type.md) | Maybe&lt;[PriceTypeEnum](./magento-api.pricetypeenum.md)<!-- -->&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> FIXED, PERCENT, or DYNAMIC. |
|  [price?](./magento-api.customizablecheckboxvalue.price.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['Float'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The price assigned to this option. |
|  [sku?](./magento-api.customizablecheckboxvalue.sku.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['String'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The Stock Keeping Unit for this option. |
|  [sort\_order?](./magento-api.customizablecheckboxvalue.sort_order.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['Int'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The order in which the checkbox value is displayed. |
|  [title?](./magento-api.customizablecheckboxvalue.title.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['String'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The display name for this option. |
|  [uid](./magento-api.customizablecheckboxvalue.uid.md) | Scalars\['ID'\] | The unique ID for a <code>CustomizableCheckboxValue</code> object. |
